name: Richard Flemm
description:
I am a very gentle, I am always ready to help if needed and I do not expect anything in return. I can easily find a common language with others and I can easily become the soul of a company. I’m caring and completely non-conflicting. Close people say that it’s very easy and pleasant to communicate with me.i am new in pamplona spain .. looking for someone serious for relationship ..
In a nutshell I am a very simple and calm man,I open and kind.
